thumb.title: Klimt (English Ver.) / y4ttaze, julieraptor feat. 知声 (Chis-A)
thumb.description: I collaborated with y4ttazeさん to create the English version of クリムト! YouTube https://youtu.be/y-g-gaBGBdM◼ MUSIC/PRODUCTION/LYRICSy4ttaze @y4ttaze https://www.youtube.com/@y4ttazehttps://twitter.com/y4ttazehttps://www.nicovideo.jp/user/126612586https://bsky.app/profile/julieraptor.bsky.social◼ TUNE/ART/MVjulieraptor ​⁠ @chulie_chu https://www.youtube.com/@chulie_chuhttps://twitter.com/ChulieChuhttps://www.nicovideo.jp/user/89180804https://bsky.app/profile/julieraptor.bsky.social◼ VOCALVoiSona Chis-A [tʃíːseɪ]◼ SPECIAL THANKSA kun※ In the lyrics, to convey the original song's double-meanings in Japanese, we used several AAVE expressions and expressions related to art, which can be interpreted figuratively and literally in several ways.
thumb.last_res_body: ビョークを最初に... アイスランドの最...
